dict.acceptation: 演说，演讲，发言；说话，谈话，说话能力或方式；（乐器的）音，音色；方言，民族语言；

sent.orig: Traditional research in speech-based technology is concentrated on speech recognition, speech synthesis and natural language understanding.
sent.trans: 传统的语音技术方面的研究主要集中在语音识别、文本／语音转换和自然语言理解上。

sent.orig: The method of speech synthesize can improve naturalness of speech basing on the database of speech.
sent.trans: 基于语音数据库的语音合成方法有望进一步提高语音合成的自然度。

sent.orig: Speech audiometry adopts special testing speech tables to measure patients speech discrimination score.
sent.trans: 言语测听法采用专门编制的测听词表来检查患耳的言语识别率。

sent.orig: Medi Speech, the speech recognition and digital dictation system from G2 Speech.
sent.trans: 中介语音的Medi语音，语音识别和数字听写系统从G2的讲话。

sent.orig: Speech act include direct speech act and indirect speech act.
sent.trans: 言语行为又分为直接言语行为和间接言语行为。
